name: One Way Out (bmoconno)
description:
You find yourself in a strange science lab. There's only one way out, and you'll need to find it.

Movement: w, a, s, d or the arrow keys

Interact: e or space

Made for the 2021 LOWREZ JAM, using the option theme of "Instant Teleportation Gone Wrong" and maybe sorta kinda "Swap The Beginning And End".

Unfortunately I didn't have enough time to implement the puzzle generation I was planning on making for this game, but I think the short game here gets the point across. Maybe someday I'll come back to this and keep working on it.

Thanks for playing!

Tiny font by: Matthew Welch
